channel.title: Abouts on jk jensen
channel.description: Recent content in Abouts on jk jensen

item.title: about me
item.description: my name is Jk and i build systems. this blog the best people i know write. technical skills only get you so far. i have bigger ambitions. about me i’m currently building production systems at mysten labs. i was a production engineer at meta for a few years, working on privacy infrastructure and AR/VR. before that, i was at Arizona State University in meteor studio working on new research in augmented reality security and privacy.
